reviews.review: Love the game. A mixture of sarcasm and actual gameplay! A game i'm gonna remember for a long time!

连着第一代，神一样的操作系统没有改变
画风改编成了一个破烂的场景
[spoiler]实际是英语渣听不懂 （滑稽）[/spoiler]，
不过二代加入了一个非常令人喜爱的操作~~~
[spoiler][b]联机 联机，联机[/b][/spoiler]
还没结束portal2还加入了饰品，人物在单人还是一代的女人
双人是两个机器人，封面上的
画质比一代好很多，在破烂的场景里的剧情非常的好
进入一个地图的那种残留感还在，很生动
当然，最令我觉得值的买的地方莫过于游戏名说的那样了
转送的时候没有觉得很晕，体验起来就是这款游戏的最大亮点
有好也有坏，有些地图的目标没有显示太清楚，我和小伙伴找了好久才找到

写的不好勿喷，哪里不好告诉我，我考虑后会改的，觉得好的就支持一下~~~

İlk oyuna göre bulmacalar daha zor. Artık zıplatıcı, hızlandırıcı, temizleyici, jeller gibi bir kaç şey daha eklenmiş. Hikayesi hakkında konuşmayacağım. Sadece ilk oyununun devamı olduğunu ve yine aynı karakterle oynadığımızı söyleyeceğim. Oyunda yine diğer oyun gibi Co-Op özelliği de bulunuyor. Fazla uzatmak istemiyorum. Aslında sizin bu incelemeleri hiç okumadan direk oyunu almanız gerek. Zira oyun Valve yapımı, Valve'nin yaptığı kötü bir oyun mu var ?
相比一代，感觉二代有点过于困难了。。
Наверное лучшая игра в таком жанре.Денег я не пожалел.10 из 10

Wow! What a great sequel to a fantastic franchise!

This game made me feel an array of emotions because of how the atmosphere and story played out. With the addition of online or local co-op, this game gained even more replayability. 


The characters were absolutely hilarious at times. Once again, the atmosphere and music were great. I found the story was engaging. The puzzles were good but challenging. Finally, I absolutely love the replayability and other online capabilities allowing me to continue to enjoy this sequel.

Portal 2 is a first person puzzle game. 
This review is based off of a Local Coop experience. Playing this game was an amazing experience. This game requires focus and brains, lol. You're supposed to use portals, cubes, and other objects to solve puzzles that can be really simple or really hard. And yo, it can get really hard (at least for us lol). There was a puzzle that took us 1 hour. And guess what we did after that hour.. (YUP! We gave up). Only for us to come back to it a day later and see it was never hard to begin with. Completing these type of levels give you a great sense of accomplishment, but also reminds you that teamwork is key. This game also has its funny moments. Like, when I used the cube laser reflection to kill Muse (which leads to the point being another amazing part of this game is the no punishment. So killing her with no penalty was fun). Another thing I found great with this game was the narrative. It was very funny and was perfectly written. It had us dying of laugher often. Added to every thing I just said, this game also has a steam workshop. Meaning when you finish the game you have a large number of coop levels to download from the workshop. We would definitely give this game a recommend.

You can watch us play this game in the link below:
https://youtu.be/II6cs3sAH6g

This game is one of Valve's most classic games, and it's a pretty good one too.
First things first, I wouldn't recommend playing this tired, since some of the puzzles in this game can be really annoying if you can't concentrate well.
Right, to the review.
This game offers a lot of challenge and a plot in the singleplayer mode, which is on some parts pretty hilarious too, I'd say. The puzzles are usually fairly easy or medium of difficulty, at least in my opinion. They, however, are the main thing about the game, and the challenge they give to your brain is good.
The basic idea is to complete levels with your trusty portal gun, This gun creates a blue and an orange portal, and you can go through them once both portals are at place, or make lasers or other stuff got through them that have something to do with the level itself.
I'm not going to go in-depth into the plot since I don't want to spoil it.
The multiplayer mode is pretty fun too, it's a bit like the singleplayer mode, but there isn't such a clear plot. It's more of just a brain twister with friends. You try to get through levels that have been made in such fashion, that you need to have multiple players in your team to get through them.

As a whole, I'd give this game a 7.5/10 since it's a pretty good game, but some parts might be a bit buggy etc. (or maybe it's just me).

P.S, the cake is a lie.

Love this game!

I recommend this game. I mean, I also wrote a review for Portal 1, and it comes to the same conclusion, overall, amazing games. I liked it slightly less than the first, I liked how the first was more creepy, but it's nice to have a more challenging game. Portal 2 is harder, but in a good way. Especially near te last levels, I had to watch a few walkthroughs on YouTube every now and then. Also, I got this game on the Steam Summer Sale, so I only paid 1,99! I'd suggest waiting until a sale to buy this game, but make sure you do buy it, it's an amazing game. WARNINGWARNINGWARNING, make sure you play portal 1 before, since the stores kind of tie in, and it'd be horrible if you play it wrong and ruin an amazing game. Do not make the same mistake as I did: Portal 2 is NOT an improved version of Portal (that's what I thought) but it's a sequel to the storyline. (Still improved though) PLAY THIS GAME!

Jeu juste génial, que ce soit en coop ou même tout seul. On se prète très vite à l'histoire et aux enigmes du jeu, et très rapidement, vous allez adorer ça ! C'est même avec un petit pincement au coeur que vous finirez ce jeu ! 
Les graphismes n'ont strictement pas veillis, et on aurai l'impression que le jeu est sorti cette année ! 
Bref, jouez-y sans attendre, c'est une tuerie !

[h1] 迄今为止最佳3D解谜游戏 [/h1]
[spoiler] 请注意修饰词“3D”“解谜”（The Witness只能排第二了233）[/spoiler]
人工智能的发展最后会怎样？
这个问题，大概也就下面五种情况：
[olist]
    [*]AI过于low，无法广泛使用。
    [*]AI只能用于特殊研究，无法投入服务业等产业。
    [*]人工智能基本可以进行人类活动，但遭到人类社会强烈限制。
    [*]人工智能能进行一切人类脑力活动，并替代大多数人类。
    [*]在人工智能面前，你连被剥削的机会都没有。
[/olist]
很显然，V社的看法是最后一种。[spoiler] 从他们的招牌logo能看出来[/spoiler]
[b] "You've got your short sad life left, That's what I'm counting on."[/b]
传送门系列简单粗暴的指出这么说的理由：因为你不能永生。在这个架空的和HL联系紧密的世界中，你逃出了光圈科技，但一切早已永远失去。
不过，我们还要感谢Valve，这个在6年前已经有如此前瞻性和创造性的公司，至少让Portal的结局不会真实发生在人类身上[spoiler] 就是不会数3[/spoiler]
不再剧透，传送门系列的剧情和游戏机制好是有它好的原因的，Portal2的剧本系某美国著名作家操刀，详情可以去b站科普科普。
游戏流程长度中等，关卡和剧情不再孤立，而是有机结合，音效和优化满分[spoiler] 反正就是我期末考前查着攻略也要先通关的样子[/spoiler]

评分：游戏性14+13+15=42，体验14+12+13=39，意义10/10
附加分：
[list]
    [*]metacritic高评分 +10
    [*]最需要抱抱的反派  +10
    [*]多人模式--友尽系列 +5
    [*]创意工坊满分 +5
    [*]自家打折的时候就是便宜  +3
    [*]对不起我没有考虑晕3D群众 -8
    [*]什么时候数3了再把这10分加回来 -10
[/list]
[h1]总分：106[/h1]

最后，[spoiler]这样的传送枪和表面请给我来9999套[/spoiler]

포탈이라는 독특한 퍼즐도 신선하고 재밌었지만, 스토리가 무엇보다 좋았습니다. 터릿은 너무 귀여웠고, 특히 엔딩은 한편의 영화같았어요. 엔딩보고나서 오는 여운에, 한참을 포탈 뽕 차올랐네요. 개발자 코멘터리도 그렇고 부록들도 그렇고, 무척 섬세하게 잘 짜여진 게임이라는 생각이 듭니다. 친구와 함께 멀티플레이도 한 적이 있는데, 멀티플레이는 후반부로 갈 수록 난이도가 너무 어려워서 우정에 금갈 뻔했어요...
